arStrings.szText:
You and Varyana stack {c_important}Massacre{/c} together on kills. Each stack grants you both {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|+%|]{/c} Movement Speed, up to {c_number}[{SF_3}*{SF_5}*100|+%|]{/c}.

{c_important}Massacre{/c} resets after {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds of not killing an enemy.
